conda env create -f environment.yml
conda activate qDNA 
conda install jupyter
conda install ipykernel
python -m ipykernel install --name qDNA --display-name "Python (qDNA)"

open jupyter notebook and select the new kernel 

pip install pipreqs
pipreqs --encoding utf-8 "C:\Users\denni\OneDrive\Dokumente\2. Uni\Doktor\Python Scripts\Quantum_DNA_1.0"
# creates a requirements.txt file
